actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to freedom of choice in attending public schools.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the right of any citizen to be assigned to the public school of his parents' or guardian's choice if a minor, or to the public school of his choice if an adult, shall not be denied or abridged by the United States either directly or by means of a condition to the receipt of Federal financial assistance.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to freedom of choice in attending public schools.
